He goes out and asks, finds it and fixes the problem. He even asked his mother to not talk to me about it because I'm back in his room basically hyperventilating about a plunger. 

So that was my evening, feeling sick, taking a crap, clogging the toilet, having a panic attack and giving my boyfriend something to laugh at me about (in private if he knows what's good for him) once I've calmed down about it. How was yours??

title: My abuser will be at a family dinner tomorrow but my family doesn't know
body: I was molested as a child by a family friends son who was a few years older than me. He went to prison for killing someone (unrelated) for 15 years and has just been released. While he was in prison he sent me letters about how he's still in love with me and wants to date me. I've kept my silence this whole time out of fear of what my family will think. I don't want to cause a big fight or scene at this dinner. I mostly just want to be left alone and not have to deal with this.

title: I don‚Äôt get why I want to be skinnier when I have the body of conventional beauty standards
body: [TW: Possible disordered eating and weight numbers] Im an hourglass figure. I have 36‚Äù bum, 24‚Äù waist and 32‚Äù breasts. (For hourglass the difference from waist is 8 or more inches). I am skinny, I‚Äôm 5‚Äô9 and 114 lbs. I‚Äôm conventionally the standard for how a female should look (like in terms of Victoria secret or that type of beauty standard with the body) but yet I always want to be smaller. I was always praised on being skinny and so I started to eat less. For the past year I was eating 600-800 calories a day of just vegetables and I got down to 102 lbs. I loved how I looked and how I could see my bones but I knew I was unhealthy. Even though I‚Äôm toned and healthier now, I still don‚Äôt like it and I don‚Äôt understand why. I‚Äôm confident. But I want to be smaller

title: Grandma dying and forbidden to see her.
body:
This whole scenario is crazy anymore. I'm losing my sanity from it. My mother has always had a conditional love for her family much like my grandmother. They are practically the same person. They went periods of their life not speaking to each other because of petty differences. When I was 18 I fell in love and since he was catholic she kicked me out and shunned me for two years. I am now engaged and having the child of the same man whom I love dearly. My grandma was diagnosed with cancer and my relationship with my mother is now a reflection or cycle of my mother and grandmother. My mother made up with my grandmother and can only have one relationship at a time. My grandma and I have never been close because of their relationship. There were years at a time there was no contact. Now here we are and my brother and I have tried to make contact and make ammends with my judgemental grandmother because its the right thing to do but she refused to let us in. Now I get a call from my brother since my mother and I are still not speaking, that my grandmother has only hours left at the hospice center before she passes away and we're not allowed to see her. My mother is using my grandmother's death as a punishment for my brother and I to suffer through. I do not want her at my labor or my wedding at this point. We are not speaking because she doesn't approve of the baby or the marriage and I will never be good enough for her. Yet its all my fault. Her whole side of the family hates me because of horrible lies she's told including my little sister who I miss terribly. Shes 11 and my half sister but we were so close I never noticed. Now she hates me cause of lies and my mom has kept us apart. Everything is so messed up that my new goal is to be the best wife and mother I can be with UNCONDITIONAL love. I feel so bad for my fiance to go through this with me. I will never understand my family and just want to break the cycle. Thanks for reading. I feel like crap now that I have to sit here and wait while my grandma dies. Sorry for the wall of text. Im on mobile and I just needed to vent. 

UPDATE: it was against my grandmothers wishes and my mother has helped her make that decision by telling her me and my brother said she can die with a grudge. My mother has written both my brother and I last night saying why come now if we didnt all this time which is untrue because we were told my grandmother didn't want us to see her that way. Then I got a message from my mother this morning since facebook doesn't allow you to reblock for 48 hours and my mother says she forgives me which is fanfreakingtastic. My mother might just be crazy enough to be suicidal. I've exposed it online publicly so other people can see how messed up this situation is. I miss my 11 year old sister dearly so I put a public post up for her to see explaining what has happened and I hope she sees it. As of now she thinks I don't want to come around because my mother has told her I hate her. As far as my grandmother passing, this is how she wants it. A few of you asked why I even wanted to see her after a life of drama and fighting and mental unstability and I can't even answer that. But if she wants it this way then I can't change her mind. I told my mother not to talk to me anymore and that is why she said she forgives me in case anything happens to her. Its always been about her. My mother. Guilt tripping and stressed. Everyone in my family suspects there is something not right with her mentally. Maybe sociopathic. I just hope my sister can understand when she is free of this too. My brother and I were both kicked out at 18. I hope she gets it easier.

title: A man threatened me with a machete because I turned down his homophobic advances, and the cops told me to not let it I ruin my day
body:
Yes you did read that right. This happened earlier today and I still don‚Äôt know what to Do with myself.

I was walking to a park on the lake in my city, and it‚Äôs a beautiful day so I was going to go for a swim which I‚Äôve been doing a lot lately. It‚Äôs a good coping mechanism. And as I was walking to the tunnel that goes under the highway to get to this park, a guy walks up fast next to me and starts talking real loudly, so I took out my headphones and was like what cuz I was startled but trying to not show it. And he started in with that creepy guy hitting on you in public routine, you know the type, overly persistent, overly familiar, crude. He added to it by catching on that I‚Äôm a lesbian and throwing homophobic crap in there like is there anything I can do about that (being gay) to change it?  And I just kept trying to politely decline his requests for my name and number, where i live, if I‚Äôm meeting anyone, if he can come swimming with me. And eventually, once i was out of the tunnel, I just said you have a nice day and put on my earbuds and tried to wlak away from him as fast as I could. 

Well he continued to follow me, I had all kinds of bad feelings at this point. I was feeling uncomfortable so I called my girlfriend and had her on the phone as I walked towards the lake ore, because I knew there would be other people at the lakeshore who I could just have as witnesses. And it was hot so I was hoping he‚Äôd abandon following me and i could still swim. Well he followed from afar until I hit the lake, and then he went and sat on the top stair leading down to the pier, directly behind me. It is a big lake and a big park. He was aboslutely following me. So I kept my girlfriend on the line, and tried to not make eye contact hoping he‚Äôd leave me alone. This went on for about 25 minutes, it was scary as hell, but I missed something that would have made it even scarier. 

Someone had called the cops because he was shouting vague threats to me not fifteen feet away, and WAVING A MACHETE. Yes a f*king machete. I feel like I escaped death today barely, but the cops? Barely cared, they said they took his machete and didn‚Äôt arrest him, and that I shouldn‚Äôt let it ruin my day. He threatened to kill me with a machete because I declined his advances and the cops simply did not care despite all the witnesses, they wrote it off as him being mentally unwell and that‚Äôs that. 

I couldn‚Äôt leave because I‚Äôd have to walk past him to do so, I was hoping to wait him out and that he‚Äôd leave me alone but he didn‚Äôt and I‚Äôm so glad the cops showed up but I‚Äôm livid that they didn‚Äôt arrest him or so much as ask for my name. I‚Äôm deciding if I should go to the cops tomorrow but I‚Äôm really scared given past experiences being unable to report a SA to them.

title: I now know I was a slave.
body:
I'm sorry if this is not the sub for this but I've got to dump this somewhere. I was in a relationship with the father of my child. After I had my little on I move about 5 hours so we could live together and he could have an OK paying job. After living here for awhile he cheated and I was told to get out of his house. So I did what I could do and found another single mother in the area looking for a roommate. In the time of distress I agreed to move in with her and help her look look after her child for exchange of a place for my child and me to sleep. WHAT A MISTAKE THAT WAS! I had to watch her child from the moment I woke up till I went to sleep. Id everything for this child; made breakfast, lunch, snacks, dinner, washed her, got her clothes out everything. On top of that I cleaned the house and looked after her pets once I realized she wasn't. I never once got paid or ask for money as I was just happy for a place to stay, plus I felt like she was also on the poor side of life receiving food stamps and such. Once I move in she started working as an RN at a not so local hospital. Everything was going fine, then things started to change. She would be gone all the time. I'm talking leaving at 4 am and staying out till 11pm or later. On her days off she would just leave. At about the two month mark she turned into an ocd freak and nothing I cleaned was ever good enough. Whatever I sucked it up and started looking for a job and my own place, but trying to run a family by yourself is fucking time consuming and I didn't have any luck. Then she gets fired and goes fucking crazy. Talking about killing herself, burning family photographs, saying she was going to take her kid and run away to mexico. This goes on for about a week. Then one day she text a family member saying sheing going to kill herself. The cops come and do a well check, they leave. About 45 min later they come back and ask to see her. I go in and get her and they try to take her to get help, but she refuses to go and fights them. So now she's taken to the hospitals and is under arrest for biting the cops. I stuck with her kid. Just stuck. The child is asking me where mommy is and I have no idea what to say. After say two days social services gets involved and tells us to just sit tight for a few days. The next day the mother calls me and ask for me to come pick her up from the hospital. Once I pick her up she ask if I could take her to the bank. She goes in and about 15 mins later she comes back with 20k and hands it to me. Then she has me drive her down to the jail and she turns herself in for the assault. She tells me the money is so I can bail her out. The next day SS calls me to say the kids grandparent was coming to pick and ask if I could locate the birth certificate. I started packing everything the poor child owns and digging in the mothers papers. That's when I found the one paper that made me the maddest ever. Before she had her child she was a nanny for a family doing far less than I ever did living with them getting paid $800 A WEEK! So not only did she have the money to pay me, she knew she should be paying me. So how that same day she finds out that the grandparent is coming she calls me from jail saying I'm the reason she's lossing she child and that when she gets of she's going to kidnap my child and take her to Mexico. I hang up and call the police. They come and I pack up all of our stuff give them the money and keys and get the fuck out of there. I had to go to a safe home. I now know that this was a form if human trafficking. I was a slave. I'm hurt, I feel like I lost my own child, I just don't know what to do.

Sorry for the long read and sorry for the typos, dyslexia is a bitch.

title: I Am Angry At The Men In My Life Whose Silence Is Their Complicity
body:
Other than one of my siblings, I can't think of any other man that I know advocating for women's reproductive rights. They have the ability to protest and share resources, links, or anything to help, but they choose not to. Instead, they remain silent and allow for my rights to be taken away. It made me have so much less faith in men because time and time again they've shown me that they don't see me as a person deserving of these rights. 

I have been extremely vocal about my frustrations. I've posted any updates, knowledge, or resources, and none of the men I know have taken any of it seriously. I've seen so many guys post jokes about how they can no longer give "creampies". How fucking awful. Under one of my posts, some guy said "Well, let's make a baby then" and saw nothing wrong with that. I'm just so upset...I'm just so fearful... If you are paying attention, choose Moderate+ for severity level and No for seeking support.

title: Fuck twin peaks (the restaurant)
body:
A little back story. 
I have a two year old son who has quite a speech delay. I'm a stay at home mom who used to have a very nice career. I am on meds for depression. I still haven't lost the baby weight that I put on while pregnant, and over all I just feel like I'm not good enough. 
So last week my husband (we've been together for 12 years and married for 7) decided to let me in on some "great news". His boss has decided to have him close every Friday night so that he and his other guy coworkers can go out to a bar. Fine, I get it, he wants to have some guy time. But then he decided to let me know where they are going to make the weekly hangout be, "this new place that's kinda like a sexier hooters with a ski resort kinda thing" awesome. Why not just go to the strip bar? I should mention he told me this in the middle of shark week. 
So today has been a tough day with my son and I'm just feeling like I have no self worth. And I picked him up tonight from the twin peaks place and I just felt so inadequate. It's hard to explain to him how depressed I am but it was just so much today and then on top of it I get to pull up to this place and wonder which of the girls was his waitress and wonder just how much time was spent talking amongst his friends about how great she looks. Then he has to come home to his chubby yoga pants wearing wife. I'm just so over everything tonight. 
Thanks for reading.

title: I get physically sick when I think about being intimate with my husband
body:
My husband and I have known each other since we were in the 5th grade. We became really good friends during middle school  and that friendship remained up until sophomore year of high school when he started dating my younger sister who was a freshman at the time.

I was completely heart broken because they both knew I harbored a crush for him. Because of this I distanced myself from both as best I could‚Äî they eventually told my parents that they were dating and it really hurt having to watch them be a couple over dinner whenever they would invite him over.

They dated for 7 years before breaking up when my sister came out as a lesbian. 

In late 2017 I was visiting my parents back home and ran into him at the store. He invited me out to coffee and I agreed. We kept in touch when I went back home and he eventually asked me out. 

My old crush on him had resurfaced but I didn‚Äôt immediately accept because I needed to ask my sister first. When I talked to her she said it was fine because she‚Äôd never really felt herself with him and it was only after she‚Äôd had her first girlfriend that she‚Äôd realized what being 100% happy in a relationship really felt like. 

Fast forward to end of 2018 and he proposes to me, which I immediately accept. We got married in June of 2019 ‚Äî just a small courthouse wedding followed by a nice banquet for friends and family.

Up until that point I‚Äôd remained a virgin. It wasn‚Äôt for any religious belief ‚Äî I‚Äôd simply decided that that was the best choice for me after my first boyfriend tried pressuring me into it. 

We weren‚Äôt intimate on our wedding night because we were too exhausted nor the next morning because we had to be at the airport early to leave for our honey moon. Our first night in the resort he tried to initiate sex. It was going fine and I was really excited up until I remembered that he‚Äôd lost his own virginity to my younger sister. I freaked out and practically ran out of the room. It was a weird moment for the both of us.

We‚Äôre less than 4 months away from our one year anniversary and we still haven‚Äôt been intimate. I‚Äôve told him what‚Äôs been going on with me, and how I feel physically like puking every time we‚Äôre about to cross the threshold because the knowledge that he‚Äôs had sex with my sister always pops up right as we‚Äôre getting close. I have no idea why it happens. It‚Äôs also not in a ‚Äúholding a grudge‚Äù kind of way but more in a ‚Äúyou‚Äôve been inside my sister and now you‚Äôre going to be inside of me‚Äù kind of way. It‚Äôs a really strange, borderline creepy, feeling.

Because we‚Äôve been on lockdown together, he‚Äôs been trying extra hard to initiate sex but I keep rebuffing. A week ago he finally snapped and told me it was ridiculous that he couldn‚Äôt have sex with his own wife and then accused me of punishing him because he‚Äôd dated my sister when I‚Äôd had a crush on him. We‚Äôve been avoiding each other since.

I‚Äôve been thinking it over these last few days and I think the best thing for us would be to divorce. I just don‚Äôt see myself ever craving to have sex with him. Right now I‚Äôm seriously regretting having chosen to stay a virgin‚Äî  if we‚Äôd tried having sex while only dating then I would have discovered this grossed out feeling of committing a taboo I get a lot sooner.

title: Mirena and being in the middle (Apology for rant in advance)
body:
So, I posted about Mirena a few weeks ago and decided that I would pursue it. However, my grandfathered health insurance will not cover IUDs, even with a medical excuse (and I have one). 

I tried to go to Planned Parenthood but I apparently make too much to qualify for any sort of sliding scale discount (and they require payment in full at time of service) and the company that makes Mirena did away with their payment plan option. My regular OBGYN is requiring me to get a prescription filled and pay the full cost of Mirena ($900+) and have it sent to their office. THEN I will have to pay full price for the appointment and the ultrasound he does to confirm correct placement.

I guess I'm ranting because I don't make a lot of money but I apparently make enough to not get the health care I need. Now I'm stuck paying a ton of money (and I know over the period of 5 years that it is the most cost-effective option but shelling out that much at once is awful). It's almost as though it would be better if I was unemployed and could get it for free. I'm just so, so tired of the pill and the side effects. Without it, I would be out of commission for two days per month with cramping and pain. 

I want to scream. 

/Rant

Just really needed to put my frustration into words. 

(Insert "cheese and crackers with that whine" joke)

title: Sexual Harassment at Dinner. I'm so frustrated.

Shortly after, I saw a man in the window facing towards me. I thought it was strange that there was a man just standing in front of the window but I ignored it at first because maybe he was just waiting for someone. title: I quit my job
body:
This is a rant so I apologize, I just don't have anyone else to talk to about this. This is also a long story that has been condenced. Any clarifications I will be happy to answer. 

I quit my job a couple weeks ago. I worked in the car business for 3 years and worked with all men. 

At the dealership, there was this one instance of another manager at a different (sister) store who helped me put a deal together. My managers were fine with it, but made sure to say "the only reason he's helping you is because you're an attractive young female, if you were any of the guys here he wouldn't bother to help you." BOY did that rub me the wrong way. 

Small things like that kept happening. Talking down to me, talking over me, giving a correct answer and them not believing me until a different salesman repeats it, etc... I got so fed up that I called my boyfriend at work, almost in tears, and told him I was quitting. He said "That's fine baby. We'll figure it out, do what you need to do." I walked in to the managers office and quit. 

When they sent me my exit interview it was 35 questions. My bf said "Now is the time to tell them what you told me. How you feel like they were treating you different because you're a woman." I said "I don't want to say that though...I don't want to pull that card. If they read that they'll probably think 'she's lying and being dramatic'". He looked at me very seriously and said "If you feel that way, then you DEFINITELY need to be honest." 

So I was. I was honest and it was almost cathartic. Im not sure anything will come of it. But now I work at a bridal boutique selling wedding gowns, surrounded by women and I have NEVER been this happy at a job in my life. 

TL;DR Working with all men at a dealership sucks and towards the end I really started to hate my life and feel mistreated.

title: My ex posted intimate pictures of me on Grindr

title: RANT You do know depression is a choice, right?
body:
... Those were the exact words the GP used when I came in for a refill prescription.

I recently switched meds, from Sertraline to Sipralexa as my regular GP adviced me to. The Sertraline seemed to be losing its effectiveness (been on it for four years at least) and together we decided it would be good to make the switch.
He told me to come see him after a month for a checkup and a refill.

So my regular GP is on leave or sick or something and he has a replacement doctor so I make my appointment with him. No biggy.

...And that's the second thing that came out of his mouth: "You do know depression is a choice, right? "

He first asked me how long I'd been depressed. 

First of all, I'm not suffering from depression. If you had read my file, Dr. Douche, you'd have known I've been suffering from an anxiety disorder for the last seventeen years, for which I've been hospitalised months at a time twice.

You'd have known I've been on and off meds, seen more than a dozen specialists, therapists and sought relieve from alternative medicine. 

You'd have known I've made leaps towards living a normal life and how fucking hard it all is. Just coming to see you, is a struggle.

You'd have known the guilt I feel for not being a productive member of society.
How much of a failure I see myself.

I'm working on it, putting small step after small step to become an independent woman who feels worthy of being loved and worthy to be living.

And that's what you have to say?!!

Fuck you, you arrogant pedantic bastard! Oh, and once I found my voice again I reported you to the front desk.

Ya douche!

title: Ex BF family sues me for imaginary child they think I have
body:
I originally posted this on r/legaladvice bUt someone suggested I post it here for more woman perspective. If anybody has any tips or help on what to do I would really appreciate it. 

Edited: I know I wasn‚Äôt the best partner ever but this is insane how far they‚Äôre going to ruin my life. I don‚Äôt get why there are people going this far to cause harm. 
It was because of this past relationship that I to seek out therapy, and this is making so fearful for my future and giving me crippling anxiety. 


Throw-away account obviously.

I escaped an abusive toxic relationship over a year ago, broken hearted. A couple months ago my ex‚Äôs brother calls me and says that my ex died and he want me to know how much he hated me and that I am not welcome to the funeral and that everyone there hates me. Completely uncalled for but still hurt a lot. Now yesterday I get served paperwork‚Äôs for a lawsuit my Ex‚Äôs mother filed for a child she thinks I had that i never did. I can‚Äôt even get pregnant. I don‚Äôt even think my ex is deceased, I think they‚Äôre going out of their way to torment me. I don‚Äôt know what to do. They think I carried a child when we broke up and now sued me for custody I‚Äôve been freaking out. I don‚Äôt want more trouble. And these are insane white rich people that have hired two attorneys for this lawsuit. I built up the courage to try and call the attorney to explain that this must be a mistake because I don‚Äôt have a child and I‚Äôve never been pregnant. All they did was yell at me and not let me speak telling me how bad I‚Äôm going to have for not complying. When I managed to get a word in saying I don‚Äôt have a kid they insisted I put it for adoption and how screwed I am for doing this. I don‚Äôt know what to do I don‚Äôt have much funds to hire a lawyer and I‚Äôm completely ignorant of the process. If anybody has any tips it would mean the world to me. Sorry for making this half a venting too. Thank you.

title: Unemployment in Relationships
body:
Unemployment in Relationships

I feel like I‚Äôm at the end of my rope and don‚Äôt know how to handle this situation. 

I (26F) have been with my husband (29M) for 10 years. We started dating when I was 16, he proposed when I was 20, got married at 24. He‚Äôs always had a passion for computer programming and graduated college to be a software developer in 2019. He got a job with a start up company right out of college and loved it there, but his boss and him didn‚Äôt see eye to eye, and after a year or so he was laid off for the company ‚Äúnot having enough work‚Äù and needing to cut back their employees. 

He got another job shortly after but it was a temporary position working on a project. Only lasted a few months. 

We got married in October 2021, and he was laid off from that temp position in December 2021. He hasn‚Äôt had a job since. 

I 100% believe he‚Äôs trying his best, he‚Äôs had countless interviews with software companies and others that are a bit out of his scope, but he was desperate. He‚Äôs applied to retail/minimum wage jobs over the last year as well, because he needs SOMETHING, also with no luck. I know the job market where I live right now is ridiculous, and even more ridiculous in his field since COVID, but I don‚Äôt know how much more of this I can take. I physically don‚Äôt make enough money to support the two of us. The last 2 years I‚Äôve taken a higher paying job and have been working insane amounts of overtime just to get bills paid, but as of a few weeks ago, overtime is no longer available. Today was the first time we flat out couldn‚Äôt pay bills, and he was upset with me for not budgeting better. 

I truly love this man but I can‚Äôt keep living like this. We already live with my parents in a cramped basement and we‚Äôre both extremely depressed. This isn‚Äôt how I wanted my marriage to start out. I feel myself slowly building resentment towards him for this situation.

title: Stealthed by a date!!
body:
I posted about this in advice too and I sure as hell wasnt expecting to be downvoted and told this ‚Äòwas a two way street‚Äô and I should ‚Äòkeep my pants on‚Äô soo figured I‚Äôd come here for some kind of support because now I‚Äôm losing my mind even more. 

I was stealthed on a date and now I‚Äôm PREGNANT fgs. So I literally told this guy I ran out of my pill (would have made him use a condom anyway because I‚Äôm not trying to get gonorrhea, but I feel like men respond more to the risk of pregnancy) so he puts a condom on. The whole time it‚Äôs all ‚Äòugh I hate condoms‚Äô and I‚Äôm like ‚ÄòI don‚Äôt care???‚Äô And we have sex and he finishes and I‚Äôm sure I saw him take the condom off after the first time. The second time (unsure why there was even a second time) was like 4am half asleep and I watched him put a condom on again, all is well, we do doggy and I‚Äôm guessing this is when he took it off and finished. I went to the loo after and didn‚Äôt see whether he still had it on, this has never happened to me before sooo excuse me for not checking. 

Next thing you know, my boobs are so sore and I‚Äôm vomiting! And lo and behold I‚Äôm pregnant. I‚Äôve booked in for my GP appointment so I can get an abortion (I am not about to have a child, especially with this piece of garbage). Luckily they‚Äôre free and they‚Äôre (relatively) easy. The way I feel about this though is so horrible. I feel very disrespected, I feel dumb like maybe I should take a time out every 5 mins to ensure the condom is still on?? I feel depressed because I‚Äôve had to walk around for a whole week now thinking about how a foetus is living inside me and it freaks me out. 

I wanna message him but idk what to say, maybe playing dumb like you wore a condom right??? and sending him a photo of the test like ://// guess we got a baby now. 

And I know it‚Äôs illegal here but I‚Äôm not wasting my time with the police I just think that‚Äôs gonna be even more traumatic. 

And yes I‚Äôm going straight back on birth control once this nightmare is over üôÉüôÉüôÉ

title: In denial about liking pink
body:
Pink used to be my favorite color as a child, but due to childhood trauma I've stayed away from it. My abuser's faborite color is pink and she's obnoxious about it. I feel like it associates me with her.

 Idk how to explain it, but I feel like liking pink makes me like everyone else, and i like being different. This is an every day thing. "I like this shirt but it's in pink, I'm not a pink girlie". "This lamp is cute but I don't like pink like that"

Long story short, I like other colors more now. But I still like certain pinks. I'm just really in denial and don't know how to go about it. Like it looks good now but will it serve as a trauma reminder later? Tips, tricks, etc.

title: TW: sex without consent - Had a really negative sexual experience last night
body: I know I could post this on r/ sex, but this community seems super supportive so I felt like griping here. I (29F) went on a first date with a guy (36M) who is getting ready to record an album, so I invited him over after drinks to do some singing and maybe make out a little since I‚Äôm on my period. One thing led to another and while he asked for consent to kiss me there was no other consent - suddenly he‚Äôs putting on a condom and getting inside me. Penetrative sex is extremely painful for me (I‚Äôve done lots of PT and meds for it but that‚Äôs another story), and I usually have the opportunity to communicate that before it happens, but I didn‚Äôt get the chance to this time. Thankfully it was over after around six thrusts, but then there was no discussion about pleasuring me, just pillow talk. I was shedding a few tears during that time but he didn‚Äôt seem to notice. It wasn‚Äôt until after he left that I sobbed and sobbed. Still crying a lot today. The worst part was that I didn‚Äôt feel like I could communicate how I was feeling because it‚Äôd already happened. That‚Äôs my story, just looking for some support if anyone has some to give. Thanks folks~

title: I'm marrying an abusive man because I don't want to be alone.
body: I'm 20 and I'm getting married in 2 months on my birthday, but my fiance hits me when he's angry. I'm afraid to leave him because he's the best I could possibly do. He's handsome and successful. I can't imagine mysel finding any one better.
